attributes.action: I want Parliament to respect and honour the 17.4 million who voted to leave .
attributes.additional_details:
Why is it unlawful to prorogue Parliament, but ok to disregard the votes of those that wanted to leave. There could be more serious problems if those opposing Brexit actually succeed in overturning a democratic vote. 
Labour, Lib Dem’s, SNP, Green Party, the Welsh Party, you should be ashamed of yourselves for your actions. I voted Labour all my life, but will vote conservative in future. If everyone, got behind the government, there would be no problem!
attributes.background:
The 17.4 million votes to leave the EU must be honoured and respected. The reasons that I and everyone else voted to leave was to do our own thing, to have our own independence, to make our own rules and laws, to make our own trade deals. 
That is what we voted for and want.
